name: Rolling Snow (LotusHOV, GabeContra)
description:
This is a game created for Go Godot Jam 2021 (maybe there will be another?). 

As the theme of this jam was growth, the first things that came to my mind were Katamari and Room to Grow. I added some more inspiration from Snakebird and the strength puzzles from Pokemon, mashed it all together, and came up with this. A game where you roll up snowballs to make snowmen. I know it isn't the setting one would immediately think of with growth, but I wanted to keep the concept of growth front and center and didn't want to limit myself for the setting. I hope that helps it stand out a bit more. 

Although I have something here worth putting up for the game jam, I plan on continuing development for some time. I worked together with my friend Gabriel Contreras to make this game, overall, I'd say we both contributed about equally to this during the game jam.

Controls

Up, down, left, and right to move. That's it. Also there's a reset button at the top left if you ever feel stuck.

Credits

Lead Programmer: Gabriel Contreras
